item.description:
This event is being hosted by Larry F.

Join the Sitzundjibers hiking group for Part 2 of the Blue Hills hike. This hike will complete the hike started in June. We will start at the Park Headquarters on Hillside Street and hike east on the Skyline Trail over Tucker and Buck Hills to Chickataubut Hill, spending a few minutes at the Overlook before heading back. This hike is ~ 50% longer than the first part and will involve a little more up and down. We will hike at a brisk pace to get back by 1:00. Plan to meet at 8:45 so we can start at 9:00 promptly.

Unlike the first hike, we will not be able to wait for late comers

Bring ~ one liter of water and snacks to eat on the way. Good shoes and appropriate attire are required.

Rain cancels.
item.name: A hike in the Blue Hills
